titles.title: A bill to temporarily suspend the duty on Bendiocarb.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2429)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend the duty on 2,2,-Dimethyl-1,3-benzodioxol-4-yl methylcarbamate (bendiocarb) through December 31, 1994.
